name: Koala & Friends
description:
For Cute Kids!

Well-designed game content, exercise child's memory and finger flexibility.

= {Koala&Friends} function=
5 puzzle games are waiting for you here

● Role playing!
Enjoy cute role playing! Play with elephants, koalas, tigers and bears to help them wear their favorite clothes. Dozens of clothes and professional suits can learn the characteristics of various jobs from the game.
Take a picture after dressing!

● Free painting!
Draw anything arbitrarily and color the animals with the help of the guides.
Draw a colorful world!

● Theme puzzle!
Move the pieces on the screen to complete it. Three levels of difficulty, interesting themes, simple interface, enjoy it!

● Magic puzzle!
Six different geometric combinations that combine various graphics, such as animals, people, houses, and more.

● Memory chess!
Open two identical cards in succession until they are all open. If you want to play well, you have to remember the location of the card~
